cast.overview: Disciplined Italian composer Antonio Salieri becomes consumed by jealousy and resentment towards the hedonistic and remarkably talented young Salzburger composer Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart.
cast.title: Amadeus

details.biography: Rene Gabzdyl was born on 25 July 1943 in Vítkovice, Ostrava, Protektorát Cechy a Morava [now Czech Republic]. He was an actor, known for Amadeus (1984), A Well Paid Walk (1966) and Tomorrow I'll Wake Up and Scald Myself with Tea (1977). He died on 30 December 2005 in Prague, Czech Republic.
details.name: René Gabzdyl
